descriptor.name: hoop Epsom Body Wash - Morning Energy, Hand & Feet Soak, Workout Recovery, Pain, Destress (300 ml)
descriptor.short_desc: hoop Epsom Body Wash - Morning Energy, Hand & Feet Soak, Workout Recovery, Pain, Destress (300 ml)
descriptor.long_desc: Epsom Energy Body Wash not only cleans but also leaves you fresh, energised, and ready to take on the day! This Epsom Salt infused Women and Mens Body Wash works fast to replenish your body's lost energy, from de-cramping tense muscles to muscle recovery. Sprinkled with ocean-breeze aromatherapy, this is the ultimate shower gel for men and women to begin and end your day on an uplifting note! Amazing for hand and feet soak as well to melt away the tiredness, its the best body wash you can come across.- Key Benefits :• Epsom Salt• Muscle Recovery• Fresh notes of lavender & epsom minerals• Replenish your body's lost energy• Natural Ingredients -Marketer Name: Hedso Health and Wellness Pvt. Ltd. -Marketeer Address: 28 Vidya Vihar, West Enclave, Pitampura, Delhi - 110034 -EAN : 8906164570088

descriptor.name: hoop Stress Relief Mist - Eucalyptus Oil for Work Stress, Yoga Mat, Meditation & Energy (100 ml)
descriptor.short_desc: hoop Stress Relief Mist - Eucalyptus Oil for Work Stress, Yoga Mat, Meditation & Energy (100 ml)
descriptor.long_desc: Rise & shine! Improve mood, relax & energise mind in one quick pump. The Happy Hormones Stress Mist is an aromatherapy blend packed with feel-good ingredients. Use for yoga, meditation, at work, and during stressful moments. Infused with energizing eucalyptus oil and spearmint oil, you'll be ready to tackle anything - hectic meetings, exam worries, crazy traffic, and more! Replace your stress gummies or ashwagandha or stress relief toys. Get ready to \"Om\" your stress away!- Key Benefits : • Aromatherapy Spray• Eucalyptus & Spearmint Essential Oils• Use for yoga, meditation, work• Natural Ingredients -Marketer Name: Hedso Health and Wellness Pvt. Ltd. -Marketeer Address: 28 Vidya Vihar, West Enclave, Pitampura, Delhi - 110034 -EAN : 8906164570071

descriptor.name: hoop Magnesium Stress Body Lotion - Relax Muscles post Workout, Energise with Eucalyptus (250 ml)
descriptor.short_desc: hoop Magnesium Stress Body Lotion - Relax Muscles post Workout, Energise with Eucalyptus (250 ml)
descriptor.long_desc: A lightening bolt of energy for your early mornings with our Transdermal Magnesium Therapy fir muscle recovery! This is no ordinary body lotion. Sure, it nourishes and hydrates. Use it as both body lotion for men and body lotion for women. But our Magnesium Stress Relief Body Lotion with Aromatherapy will quickly become your go-to stress relief for gearing up for long days and when you need a pick me up. Perfect for pre-work mindfulness, post-workout recovery, and those pesky body aches. Replace those stress gummies or add to your morning ritual or use post-workout and shower.- Key Benefits : • Magnesium Therapy • Ecualyptus Oil • Relaxes muscles for rest and recovery • Natural Ingredients -Marketer Name: Hedso Health and Wellness Pvt. Ltd. -Marketeer Address: 28 Vidya Vihar, West Enclave, Pitampura, Delhi - 110034 -EAN : 8906164570057

descriptor.name: hoop Magnesium Sleep Body Lotion - Relax Muscles post workout, Calm Sleep with Lavender (250 ml)
descriptor.short_desc: hoop Magnesium Sleep Body Lotion - Relax Muscles post workout, Calm Sleep with Lavender (250 ml)
descriptor.long_desc: No more tossing & turning! Let us usher you into a cocoon of restful sleep with Transdermal Magnesium Therapy by this night body lotion. Our Magnesium Sleep Aromatherapy Body Lotion absorbs into skin for deep sleep, superb relaxation & muscle recovery, so you can power off your device, say adios to late working hours and sleep gummies, and hello to deep sleep – all without having to count sheep! Feel light & airy with magnesium, lavender & chamomile! Use the body lotion dry skin daily after gym, before sleep and perfect bedside essential with our all natural ingredient lotion.- Key Benefits : • Magnesium Therapy• Lavender aroma• Relaxes body for good sleep and recovery• Natural Ingredients -Marketer Name: Hedso Health and Wellness Pvt. Ltd. -Marketeer Address: 28 Vidya Vihar, West Enclave, Pitampura, Delhi - 110034 -EAN : 8906164570040

descriptor.name: hoop Hand Cream - Moisturizer & Pain Relief for Wrist, Thumb, Carpal Tunnel, Finger (50 g)
descriptor.short_desc: hoop Hand Cream - Moisturizer & Pain Relief for Wrist, Thumb, Carpal Tunnel, Finger (50 g)
descriptor.long_desc: Rescuing your hard-working hands that never get a break! Powered with cinnamon extracts & cooling menthol, our lightweight Hand Pain Relief Cream melts hand cramps, pain in finger joints, wrists & thumb, while shea butter & ceramides make skin feather-soft and nourish them. This hand cream acts like a pain-relieving and moisturizer super-combo hydration cream or moisturizer cream - laptop users, gamers, smartphone addicts can thank their lucky stars. This non-greasy and non-sticky hand cream made with natural ingredients is a desk essential. Perfect for people who use wrist band, wrist and finger support, finger support, thumb support. Apply it and carry on with your day!- Key Benefits : • Effective Hand Pain Relief • Menthol Cinnamon Formula• Natural Ingredients• Moisturizing, Fresh Smell• Relief from Hand Cramps, Wrist Pain, Finger Joints Pain, Thumb Pain, Carpal Tunnel -Marketer Name: Hedso Health and Wellness Pvt. Ltd. -Marketeer Address: 28 Vidya Vihar, West Enclave, Pitampura, Delhi - 110034 -EAN : 8906164570033

descriptor.name: hoop Pain Relief Roll On - Cryotherapy Cooling Relief from Back, Leg, Knee, Joint Pain (50 ml)
descriptor.short_desc: hoop Pain Relief Roll On - Cryotherapy Cooling Relief from Back, Leg, Knee, Joint Pain (50 ml)
descriptor.long_desc: Say goodbye to sticky back pain relief oil! India's first cryotherapy Pain Relief Roll On delivers quick back pain relief, neck pain relief, leg pain relief, calf pain relief, elbow pain relief, shoulder pain relief, heel pain relief and feels like an ice pack when applied. Don't shy away from using in sensitive areas - thigh, hamstring, groin, abs. This FDA Approved Pain Relief Roll On heals by cooling and is a great smelling back pain relief products. The roll-on format is perfect for on the go, keep hands clean and apply anytime pain strikes - goodbye to sticky pain relief oil. Smell fresh and get cooling relief!- Key Benefits : • Cryotherapy Formula • Cooling Pain Gel• Works Instantly • Mess Free Roll On Format• Natural Ingredients, AYUSH Certified • Relief from Neck Pain, Lower Back Pain, Shoulder Pain, Muscle Pain, Workout & Sports -Marketer Name: Hedso Health and Wellness Pvt. Ltd. -Marketeer Address: 28 Vidya Vihar, West Enclave, Pitampura, Delhi - 110034 -EAN : 8906164570019

list.value: Shake well before use. Roll 4-6 times in same direction strokes over affected area. Do not use circular motion. Do not use more than 4 times a day. -Caution: For external use only.Keep out of reach of children. When using the product: Avoid contact with eyes or mucous membranes. Do not apply to wound or broken skin. Wash hands after use with cold water. Stop use if irritation occurs.

descriptor.short_desc: hoop Headache Roll On - Fast Cooling Migraine Roll On for Headache, Sinus, Cold (10 ml)

Our headache roll on can be used as a headache balm, roll on headache, head pain balm, roll on balm, liquid balm for headache, sinus relief product. descriptor.name: hoop Sleep Mist - Lavender Pillow Spray for Better Sleep Quality, Good Sleep Aid (100 ml)
descriptor.short_desc: hoop Sleep Mist - Lavender Pillow Spray for Better Sleep Quality, Good Sleep Aid (100 ml)
descriptor.long_desc: Say goodnight to insomnia & fatigue with Starry Nights Sleep Mist! A blend of Lavender-chamomile sleep aromatherapy from the valleys of Kashmir, this nightime remedy is the perfect natural sleep support to help you snooze faster, get deep sleep, and with no disruption. No matter how many late hours you've worked or how much you've been on your phone - wake up feeling refreshed always with our lavender oil for sleep! This sleep oil for deep sleep is an unmissable step in your bedtime routine. It works like melatonin supplements, sleep medicine, sleep gummies just without their side-effects. Spray 7-8 times on bed, pillow, skin and clothes.- Key Benefits :• Sleep Deep Naturally • Lavender-Chamomile Aromatherapy• Spray freely on bed & pillow at bedtime• Sleep faster, deeper, and with no disruption• Natural Ingredients - no drugs, non-addictive-Marketer Name: Hedso Health and Wellness Pvt. Ltd. -Marketeer Address: 28 Vidya Vihar, West Enclave, Pitampura, Delhi - 110034 -EAN : 8906164570064

descriptor.short_desc: hoop Pain Relief Spray - Cryotherapy Cooling Relief from Back, Leg, Knee, Joint, Sports Pain (80g)

Works very well for back pain relief, heel pain relief, leg pain relief, shoulder pain relief, neck pain relief and more! hoop pain relief sprays is like an ice pack in a bottle for pain relief - goodbye burn and sticky pain relief oil! Use at home, at work, or after gym as back pain relief products. Bonus: we don't smell bad.- Key Benefits : • Cryotherapy Formula • Cooling Pain Relief • Works Instantly • Fresh Smell • Natural Ingredients, AYUSH Certified • Relief from Back Pain, Knee Pain, Leg Pain, Joint Pain, Sprains & Strains, Workout & Sports -Marketer Name: Hedso Health and Wellness Pvt. list.value: Shake well before each use. Hold 6 inches away from affected area and spray. Repeat 3-4 times a day. Massage not necessary. -Caution: For external use only. Do not spray on open flame. Do not spray near eyes or face. Protect the face when spraying near neck or shoulders. Avoid direct inhalation. Keep out of reach of children. Do not spray on open wounds or damanged skin. Use as directed, contact a physician if the condition worsens. If pregnant or breast feeding, ask a physician before use.
